name: CopyCat (itch) (Justin)
description:
Magic cat turn into things. 
Magic cat no like pats. 

Magic cat like box.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

My first solo jam in UE4, since picking it up in November 2021. 

I usually focus on programming, but decided to try out modelling in Blender and the particle system in UE4. I wasn't able to properly export the toon shaders - except for the outline - I had made in Blender, which was a major bummer.  I'm happy with how the magic cloud puff turned out.
